title.rendered: Earn $10,000/Month With Best Paid Online Survey Sites Deal

content.rendered:
Take a survey, get cash! Simple as that. There are several companies that offer money in exchange for taking surveys on their website or app. You can make anywhere from $0-$80 per hour doing this type of work, depending on how well you do.

Contents on This Page

Toggle
    • Online Survey: What is it?
  • The Legit Paid Online Survey Sites
    • Branded Surveys
    • Swagbucks
    • Toluna – Legit Online Survey Sites
    • i-Say (IPSOS)
    • LifePoints
    • InboxPounds
    • Valued Opinions

    • Y Live – Paid Online Survey Sites

You can also work part-time or full-time on your own schedule and decide how much time you want to invest in this type of activity.

in addition, The average annual income of a software tester working for an online survey company is in excess of $60,000.

Online Survey: What is it?

Online survey sites are an industry where you can make $10,000/month. These are some of the most legitimate ways to earn money from home, but it’s important to know what it takes to get started on this path.

Do you want to make $10,000/month doing online survey sites deal?

You don’t have to spend hours filling in surveys, nor do you have to pay extortionate prices to join the survey companies. Just create your own website for doing surveys and earn money through online surveys by testing products, filling in quiz questions and performing simple tasks.

The Legit Paid Online Survey Sites

Branded Surveys

An online community that conducts frequent surveys on global market research.

What are they? Because they offer a large number of paid surveys, branded surveys are popular with survey enthusiasts.

  • Rewards: Gift cards or cash.
  • Sum for each survey: 50 to 500 points (one point equals one dollar or £0.77)
  • Min. threshold for reward: $5 (£3.75).

Our analysis: As we notice in our Marked Studies audit, this review site is one of our undisputed top choices. Great new website that is simple to use, has good Trustpilot reviews, and pays quickly.

You can also get a percentage of everything your friends earn and continue to earn points by referring them.

Swagbucks

many different ways to get rewards. Special bonus for signing up!

What are they? One of the largest and most dependable paid survey sites is Swagbucks. Over $600,000,000 in rewards have been distributed to members worldwide thus far. They reward players who accept offers, browse the internet, make online purchases, and watch videos!

  • Rewards: vouchers, cash, and prize draws.
  • Sum for each survey: 30 to 150 SB points (one SB equals one dollar or £0.77)
  • Min. threshold for reward: 1 SB.

Our analysis: We adore Swagbucks. Additionally, we get positive feedback about them from our readers. Daily participation in polls and surveys has proven to be the most profitable use of your time. However, the website currently offers eleven ways to earn Swagbucks.

You can earn approximately $6.50 per hour by completing surveys, which take about 10 minutes to complete. Swagbucks also lets users take surveys from a variety of companies and gives them consolation points if they don’t qualify for a survey. Check out our complete Swagbucks review to learn more about how to get points and rewards.

To get your hands on a special $20 signup bonus, click on our button down below.

Toluna – Legit Online Survey Sites

Toluna is one of the largest panels that conduct online surveys on a daily basis. Paid as money or vouchers.

What are they? a reliable opinion website that represents major businesses. They want to know what you think of particular issues, services, and products. You get rewarded in return!

  • Rewards: Amazon and high-street vouchers, PayPal payments.
  • Sum for each survey: 1,200 to 50,000 points; 80,000 points earn you a voucher for £15
  • Min. threshold for reward: 27,000 for vouchers, or 500 for entry into prize draws.

Our analysis: We have written a comprehensive Toluna review. On the website or through the app, taking multiple surveys each day is simple.

It takes about 15 minutes to complete each survey. Therefore, earning a £15 voucher will take approximately four hours (or $3.75 per hour).

Additionally, Toluna has recently added a games section where you can play and earn money!

i-Say (IPSOS)

Earn over £10 per month.

What are they? One of the biggest and best paying overview based statistical surveying organizations. Worldwide, IPSOS collaborates with reputable brands and research firms.

  • Rewards: Vouchers from High Street and Amazon, in addition to prize draws for all members.
  • Sum for each survey: ~£1.
  • Min. threshold for reward: £10.

Our analysis: a survey panel that is trusted. Every week, IPSOS sends you surveys to answer via email. Most people will be able to cash out in less than ten surveys due to the low reward threshold.

LifePoints

You can earn £3-5 per hour by taking surveys on LifePoints.

What are they? LifePoints is the result of the merger of MySurvey and GlobalTestMarket, two widely used survey platforms.

  • Rewards: Amazon and high-street vouchers, PayPal payments.
  • Sum for each survey: ~£1.
  • Min. threshold for reward: £5 = 550 points.

Our analysis: LifePoints sent a lot of paid surveys to us. By matching your interests and profile, they typically seem to be pretty relevant.

You will receive 100 points for completing the typical survey, which takes about 15 minutes. So you could procure around £3-£5/hour.

Fill out the form below, wait for some surveys to be sent to you, and start earning right away. its one of the best side hustle for students

InboxPounds

Students adore this unconventional survey website because of that. Earn money by playing games and browsing the internet! Free bonus for joining.

What are they?

Otherwise called InboxDollars in the US, this laid out local area rewards you for exercises past paid reviews.

  • Rewards: vouchers and money.
  • Sum for each survey: 20p – £1.
  • Min. threshold for reward: £20.

Our analysis:

InboxPounds adds a little excitement to making money online if you’re looking for a little variety.

In exchange for cash, you can choose to take surveys, earn cash back, play games, read emails, or search the web.

You can as of now get a reward only for joining, so nothing to lose here. The minimum payout may not be reached for several weeks.

Valued Opinions

voucher for £10 per hour.

What are they? Valued Opinions is a subset of a broader group of market researchers. Members whose profiles match broad demographics and requirements are contacted via online surveys.

  • Rewards: Coupons (inc. John Lewis, Amazon, M&S, and Sainsbury’s).
  • Sum for each survey: £1 – £5.
  • Min. threshold for reward: £10.

Our analysis: Valued Opinions sends only relevant surveys to take part in using your profile.

The surveys, which can last anywhere from 10 to 30 minutes each, are typically fascinating. Therefore, you could acquire a £10 voucher within an hour.

YouGov

Get 50p for each survey.

What are they?

This differs slightly from other legit Paid Online survey sites. Yougov focuses more on topics of general interest and social issues. Their surveys incorporate themes like legislative issues, public undertakings and business items. Fantastic if you hold strong opinions!

  • Rewards: Draws for prizes and money.
  • Sum for each survey: 50p – £3.
  • Min. threshold for reward: £50.

Our analysis: Due to the variety of surveys they conduct, YouGov is one of the more intriguing sites to join. Most are on recent concerns that are in the information and they urge you to communicate your perspectives.

Surveys aren’t always that frequent, but they can take up to 30 minutes. We received one or two every two weeks, so reaching the threshold may take several months.

However, joining earns you one penny. You can quickly earn a lot more points and cash if you refer friends!

Survey Junkie

Low payout threshold and a sign-up bonus of just 25p.

What are they? a new UK-based version of a well-known survey site from the US.

Rewards: PayPal money.

Sum for each survey: 10p – £3

Min. threshold for reward: £5 Our evaluation: When you sign up, you get 25 points, and you get another 50 points when you answer a few quick profile questions. Regarding the value of 100 points, £1

There is already a good selection, but we anticipate that many more surveys will be added as this website expands in the UK.

Opinion Outpost

one of the lowest thresholds for payouts.

What are they? Opinion Outpost’s rapid payouts and enjoyable surveys have increased their popularity.

Rewards: Cash and Amazon Gift Cards.

Sum for each survey: 50p

Min. threshold for reward: £2.50 Our evaluation: This is the survey site you need to use if you want to make money quickly. To get paid, you only need to take five surveys. It takes about 10 to 15 minutes for each survey.

PrizeRebel

£2 least prize edge.

What are they?

PrizeRebel is a site where users can “get paid to” and has a robust paid survey section.

Rewards: Cash or gift cards from PayPal.

Sum for each survey: 50p – £20

Min. threshold for reward: $2 Our evaluation: A great paid survey site if you want to get paid quickly and cheaply. To get a £2 Amazon voucher, you only need 200 points.

For a 10-minute survey, anticipate earning approximately 20 points. Watch videos and complete offers to find additional points-earning opportunities.

Marketagent

Interesting consumer product surveys conducted online: Who are they? Over 2 million people use Marketagent worldwide.

Rewards: Cash or gift cards from PayPal.

Sum for each survey: 10p – £3.60.

Min. threshold for reward: £10.

Our analysis: Marketagent is a respectable site for online surveys. Due to their large user base, they conduct a large number of surveys.

It requires close to 15 minutes to finish each overview.

Pinecone Research

£3 per survey, invite only.

Who are they?

Pinecone are an exclusive survey and product testing company, currently invite-only.

Rewards: £3 per completed survey, free products to test and keep.

Amount per survey: £3.

Min. reward threshold: £3.

Our review: Pinecone is the Holy Grail of survey sites and invites are rare, so sign up while we have some invites on offer. The payout is huge and surveys don’t take too long to complete.

Note: There’s no guarantee they’ll be open to new registrations at any one time. We try to arrange a limited number for our readers each month. Check the link below. If we don’t, join our newsletter for updates!

PanelBase

Earn £3 just for signing up!

Who are they? PanelBase isn’t your average survey site. They don’t inundate you with surveys, but the ones they do send are very well paid and relevant.

Rewards: Money, vouchers and prize draws.

Amount per survey: 50p – £10 (avg. ~£1.50).

Min. reward threshold: £10.

Our review: £3 just for signing up to a survey site is a bit of a no-brainer. The surveys pay out higher than the industry average too which gives you the chance to earn good money.

PanelBase do screen their survey respondents very carefully. You may be sent slightly fewer opportunities than other survey sites. Fully complete your profile to give yourself the best chance.

Triaba Panel

Multiple opportunities to earn.

Who are they? Part of the Cint exchange, Triaba offer paid surveys via computer and mobile.

Rewards: Paypal cash or giftcards.

Amount per survey: 16p – £2.80

Min. reward threshold: £8

Our review: This very popular survey panel from Norway is open to the UK and 84 other countries.

There are loads of surveys and they take around 6 to 10 minutes to complete. You can earn an average of 70p per survey.

Maru Voice

When you sign up, you could win £1,000.

What are they? Provide information to non-profit organizations and government agencies.

Rewards: Cash or gift cards from PayPal.

Sum for each survey: £1 – £10

Min. threshold for reward: £10 Our evaluation: This well-known Canadian company has launched an extremely user-friendly UK survey website.

There aren’t many surveys to take, but those that do tend to give you a good chance to make money. The inquiries are more fascinating than other study locales as well so it keeps you locked in.

The OpinionPanel Community

For signing up, members receive £10.

What are they? The largest panel of people between the ages of 13 and 30 in the UK. OpinionPanel conducts intriguing surveys and online focus groups for major universities and brands, and their research frequently appears in the media.

Rewards: Amazon and high-road vouchers.

Sum for each survey: 50p-4 for each survey, £30-50 for online focus groups.

Min. threshold for reward: £25

Our audit: A reliable survey site is the OpinionPanel Community. It takes about ten minutes to complete their surveys. The majority of surveys typically pay between £ and £1.

You can take surveys while on the go thanks to the site’s mobile-friendly design.

Opinion Bureau

£5 bonus upon sign up.

Who are they? A relatively new survey site with some interesting polls.

Rewards: Money or vouchers.

Amount per survey: £1 – £10

Min. reward threshold: £10

Our review: Whilst not a real top-level paid survey site, Opinion Bureau is a good option for making a little extra money.

Mingle Surveys

Receive an 80p welcome bonus.

What are they? a website that conducts surveys for the EU and UK.

Rewards: vouchers, cash, or contributions to charity

Sum for each survey: 40p – £1

Min. threshold for reward: $16 Our evaluation: This is a decent survey site for the UK and EU only. Mingle’s short surveys make it easy to accumulate the 2000 points needed to be paid.

Most studies take around 5 to 20 minutes and payout 50 focuses, comparable to 40p.

OnePoll

Exclusive £5 bonus for signing up.

What are they? best known for quick surveys on all subjects. OnePoll conducts surveys for major brands and the media.

Rewards: Payments can be made in cash or through PayPal.

Sum for each survey: 10p – £1.

Min. threshold for reward: £40.

Our analysis: OnePoll was one of the initial UK survey sites. They always have fun, short surveys to complete. Keep an eye out for surveys about celebrities.

At 20p per survey, it will take approximately 10 hours to earn £40, as surveys take about 3 minutes to complete.

Every day, look in your OnePoll account for new surveys. Getting stuck just below the £40 threshold has been reported by some users. If this occurs, you can withdraw your earnings by referring a friend for £4.

For a special £5 bonus, use the link below to sign up.

New Vista Live

Earn £5 just for joining and £100 per year.

What are they? a prominent company that conducts marketing research and has decided to conduct surveys online rather than through traditional cold calling.

Rewards: Draws for prizes and money.

Sum for each survey: About £1 for each survey.

Min. threshold for reward: £50.

Our analysis: Users of NewVista can earn cash for completing surveys—100 points equal £1. It may take some time to reach the £50 mark, but the surveys usually pay well and only take 15 minutes (roughly £4 per hour).

Since NewVista is known for including red herrings to ensure that you are actually considering your responses rather than rushing through them, be honest when answering questions.

Hiving

Good referral scheme in Legit Online Survey Sites deals.

Who are they? Hiving run online surveys on behalf of leading brands.

Rewards: Money.

Amount per survey: ~50p

Min. reward threshold: £4

Our review: Hiving reward you around 50 points per minute for completing surveys. You can withdraw as soon as you reach 4000 points (£4).

They also reward users for referring friends and give you points even if you are declined for a survey.

Panel Opinion

Low payout threshold.

Who are they? Panel Opinion are one of the most popular online survey sites in 2024.

Rewards: Money.

Amount per survey: 50p – £4.

Min. reward threshold: £10.

Our review: The surveys usually take around 10-15 minutes to complete. You can make up to £4 for a single survey sometimes.

Panel Opinion payout in cash and have a low payout threshold of just £10

Prolific Academic

Good money if you give quality answers.

Who are they? They provide data for academics and researchers at many top universities and companies.

Rewards: Money.

Amount per survey: £1-£10.

Min. reward threshold: £20 with no fee.

Our review: Prolific Academic is a high-end survey site. You have to really focus on giving good answers to keep a high score. If you drop below a certain level you’ll be screened out of most paid surveys.

However, with big effort comes big rewards. Surveys tend to take around 45 minutes and can payout as much as £10. If you can hit the sweet spot with this survey site you could make some good money.

If you’re looking for the best-paid survey websites in the UK, Prolific Academic is potentially one of the highest.

Y Live – Paid Online Survey Sites

Earn £1 every five minutes dealing on Legit Online Survey Sites

What are they? A leading UK survey site, Y Live offers surveys on everything from sports and shopping to politics and current events.

  • Rewards: Money.
  • Sum for each survey: ~£2-3.
  • Min. threshold for reward: 50 points, or £50

Our analysis: The payouts at Y Live, formerly PopulusLive, are decent. In any case, it can require investment to arrive at the edge and overviews run out rapidly once they have an adequate number of respondents.

To receive the maximum number of surveys, you must complete your profile. Your responses should be handled with extreme caution due to the stringent quality controls in place.
